title: Live From Minneapolis 3!
description:
Lila Yang, Lydia Reece and Jamie Brickhouse share stories about a DEA raid, a trip to a mental institution, and a boy's first time.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Lily Yang, Lydia Reece, Portugal. The Man, Jack Jones, Kevin Allison, Damscray, Jamie Brickhouse, Jeff Barr)
